job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>The Machine Learning Engineer will be responsible for leading teams in client projects to deliver below:</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Build, Refine and Use ML Engineering platforms and components</li><li>Scaling machine learning algorithms to work on massive data sets and strict SLAs</li><li>Build and orchestrate model pipelines including feature engineering, inferencing and continuous model training</li><li>Implement ML Ops including model KPI measurements, tracking, model drift &amp; model feedback loop</li><li>Collaborate with client facing teams to understand business context at a high level and contribute in technical requirement gathering</li><li>Implement basic features aligning with technical requirements</li><li>Write production-ready code that is easily testable, understood by other developers and accounts for edge cases and errors</li><li>Ensure highest quality of deliverables by following architecture/design guidelines, coding best practices, periodic design/code reviews</li><li>Write unit tests as well as higher level tests to handle expected edge cases and errors gracefully, as well as happy paths</li><li>Uses bug tracking, code review, version control and other tools to organize and deliver work</li><li>Participate in scrum calls and agile ceremonies, and effectively communicate work progress, issues and dependencies</li><li>Consistently contribute in researching &amp; evaluating latest architecture patterns/technologies through rapid learning, conducting proof-of-concepts and creating prototype solutions</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>3+ years’ experience in deploying and productionizing ML models</li><li>Bachelor’s degree</li><li>Expertise in crafting ML Models for high performance and scalability</li><li>Experience in the following:</li><li>implementing feature engineering, inferencing pipelines and real time model predictions</li><li>ML Ops to measure and track model performanceSpark or other distributed computing frameworks</li><li>Strong programming expertise in Python, Scala or Java</li><li>ML platforms like Sagemaker, MLFlow, Kubeflow or other platforms</li><li>deploying models to cloud services like AWS, Azure, GCP</li><li>Good fundamentals of machine learning and deep learning</li><li>Knowledgeable of core CS concepts such as common data structures and algorithms</li><li>Collaborate well with teams with different backgrounds / expertise / functions.</li></ul><p><em>A plus</em></p><ul><li>Understanding of DevOps, CI / CD, data security, experience in designing on cloud platform</li><li>Experience in data engineering in Big Data systems</li><li>Willingness to travel to other global offices as needed to work with client or other internal project teams</li></ul>
